companyName: The Law Offices of Roger P. Foley PA - West Palm Beach, FL

moreBlocks.otherOffices: Law Offices of Roger P Foley, P.A. 110 SE 6th Street 17th Floor Fort Lauderdale, FL 33301 561-532-2931

description:
With an award-winning attorney, The Law Offices of Roger P Foley PA has an exceptional reputation in criminal defense and personal injury in West Palm Beach and throughout the state of Florida.

Mr. Foley and his staff have a proven track record of securing case dismissals and not guilty verdicts in criminal issues that include the following:

  • DUI
  • Burglary, and Theft cases
  • Domestic Violence
  • Assault, Battery, and Manslaughter
  • Internet and computer crimes
  • Juvenile crimes
  • Drug and sex offenses
  • White collar crimes
  • Probation violations
  • Expungements

If you have been injured in an accident you may be entitled to compensation. Our personal injury attorneys will fight for you and will work quickly to reach a settlement or go to trial on your behalf. We will provide personal attention to your case and you will work directly with the attorney and staff member handling your case.

  • Auto Accidents, Motorcycle Accidents, Trucking Accidents
  • Trucking Accidents
  • Pedestrian Accidents
  • Premises Liability Slip and Fall Injuries
  • Negligent Security of Commercial and Residential Premises
  • Wrongful Death
  • Medical Malpractice

Mr. Foley recognizes that each matter has a unique path to resolution, including diversion, motions to suppress, plea bargaining and fighting the charges at trial. He advises clients of their options and together, they make a decision on how to proceed wisely.

For his accomplishments, Mr. Foley has earned widespread respect among clients, peers and members of the legal community. His honors include an Avvo "Superb" rating; being named a Super Lawyer; being listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100; and being named in Florida Trend Magazine's Legal Elite.

The Law Offices of Roger P Foley PA has a phone line available around the clock for a free, 15-minute initial consultation and case strategy. We also offer virtual appointments and accept credit cards. Our practice has two locations, including an office in Fort Lauderdale.
